00027 #ifndef MSQ_CYLINDER_DOMAIN_CPP
00028 #define MSQ_CYLINDER_DOMAIN_CPP
00029 
00030 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00031 #include "CylinderDomain.hpp"
00032 #include <limits>
00033 
00034 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00035 
00036 CylinderDomain::~CylinderDomain() {}
00037 
00038 void CylinderDomain::evaluate( Mesh::VertexHandle,
00039                                const Vector3D& point,
00040                                Vector3D& closest,
00041                                Vector3D& normal ) const
00042 {
00043   const double EPSILON = std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon();
00044   double t = mAxis % (point - mCenter);
00045   const Vector3D axis_point = mCenter + t * mAxis;
00046   
00047   normal = point - axis_point;
00048   const double len = normal.length();
00049   if (len < EPSILON)
00050   {
00051     Vector3D v( 1, 0, 0 );
00052     if ((v * mAxis).length() < EPSILON)
00053       v.set( 0, 1, 0 );
00054     normal = v * mAxis;
00055     normal.normalize();
00056   }
00057   else
00058   {
00059     normal /= len;
00060   }
00061   
00062   closest = axis_point + mRadius * normal;
00063   normal *= outwardSign;
00064 }
00065 
00066 void CylinderDomain::snap_to( Mesh::VertexHandle h, Vector3D& v ) const
00067 {
00068   Vector3D p(v), n;
00069   evaluate( h, p, v, n );
00070 }
00071 
00072 void CylinderDomain::vertex_normal_at( Mesh::VertexHandle h, Vector3D& v ) const
00073 {
00074   Vector3D p(v), l;
00075   evaluate( h, p, l, v );
00076 }
00077 
00078 void CylinderDomain::element_normal_at( Mesh::ElementHandle h, Vector3D& v ) const
00079 {
00080   Vector3D p(v), l;
00081     // NOTE: Explicitly invoke this class's evaluate method for elements.
00082     //       BoundedCylindarDomain overrides evaluate for vertices only.
00083   CylinderDomain::evaluate( h, p, l, v );
00084 }
00085 
00086 void CylinderDomain::vertex_normal_at( const Mesh::VertexHandle* h,
00087                                        Vector3D coords[],
00088                                        unsigned count, 
00089                                        MsqError& ) const
00090 {
00091   for (unsigned i = 0; i < count; ++i)
00092     vertex_normal_at( h[i], coords[i] );
00093 }
00094  
00095 void CylinderDomain::closest_point( Mesh::VertexHandle handle,
00096                                     const Vector3D& position,
00097                                     Vector3D& closest,
00098                                     Vector3D& normal,
00099                                     MsqError&  ) const
00100 {
00101   evaluate( handle, position, closest, normal );
00102 }
00103 
00104 void CylinderDomain::domain_DoF( const Mesh::VertexHandle* ,
00105                                  unsigned short* dof_array,
00106                                  size_t count,
00107                                  MsqError&  ) const
00108 {
00109   std::fill( dof_array, dof_array + count, (unsigned short)2 );
00110 }
